summary: Lisbela is a young woman who loves going to the movies. Leléu is a con man, going from town to town selling all sort of things and performing as master of ceremonies for some cheesy numbers... See full summary »
cast: André Mattos|Aramis Trindade|Bruno Garcia|Carlos Casagrande|Cláudio Perotto|Débora Falabella|Heloísa Périssé|Paula Lavigne|Lívia Falcão|Luisa Arraes|Marco Nanini|Michelle Birkheuer|Selton Mello|Tadeu Mello|Virginia Cavendish|Zeca Veloso|Jorgeh José Ramos|Armando Tiraboschi|Luiz Carlos de Moraes|Suzy Pereira|Freedom Cavalcanti|Gheuza de Lourdes|Luciana de Souza Cavalcanti|Rejane Trindade da Silva|Renata Duarte|Hugo Gurgel|Sergio Maciel|Moacyr João Jr.|André Borges Ferraz|Eduardo Corrêia|Aniceto de Lima|José Ivo da Silva|Marília Gabriela|Danilo Moraes|Cláudio Renée
title: Lisbela e o Prisioneiro
